original_text: While the people of Israel were in the wilderness, they found a man gathering sticks on the Sabbath day.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 광야에 거류할 때에 안식일에 어떤 사람이 나무하는 것을 발견한지라

sentences.original_text: While the people of Israel were in the wilderness
gathering sticks on the Sabbath day
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 안식일에 나무를 줍고 있는 것을
